collins.easy

collins.easy¶

Author:Arne Simon [arne.simon@slice-dice.de]

EasyCollins is the attempt to make collins a little bit more userfriendly and hides much of the direct calls to the Collins API.

Class Structures¶

class collins.easy.Basket(easy, sessionid)¶

Bases: object

Parameters:
  • easy – The EasyCollins instance.
  • sessionid – The session id the basket is associated with.
order()¶

Begins to order this basket.

class collins.easy.Category(easy, obj)¶

treeiter()¶
class collins.easy.EasyCollins(config)¶

Bases: object

Parameters:config – A collins.Config instance.
autocomplete(searchword, types=None, limit=None)¶

Autocompletes the searchword and looks in the products and/or categories for autocompletion possebilities.

Parameters:
  • searchword (str) – The abbriviation.
  • types (list) – against which types should be autocompleted. The oprions are collins.Constants.TYPES
  • limit (int) – the amount of items returned per selected type
Returns:

A tuple of two list. First one are the products and the second are the categories.

Example

>>> products, categories = easy.autocomplete("sho")
basketBySession(sessionid)¶

Returns a basket for the session id.

Parameters:sessionid – The session id the basket is associated with.
Returns:collins.easy.Basket
categories()¶

Returns the category tree.

Returns:A list of collins.easy.Category.
categoryById(cid)¶

Returns the category with the given id.

Parameters:cid – The id of the category to get.
Returns:A collins.easy.Category instance.
categoryByName(name)¶

Returns the category with the given name.

Note

If there are more than one category with the same name. The last inserted category will be returned.

Parameters:name (str) – The name of the category.
Returns:A collins.easy.Category instance.
facetgroupById(facet_group)¶

Returns all facets of a group.

Parameters:facet_group – The id or name of the facet group.
Returns:A collins.easy.FacetGroup instance.
getSimpleColors()¶

Returns an array of facet colors which are a simple selection out of the hugh possebilities.

productsByEAN(eans)¶

Gets products by its ean code.

Parameters:ean (int) – Product ean.
Returns:A collins.easy.Product instance.
productsById(pids)¶

Gets a products by its id.

Parameters:pids (list) – A list of product ids.
Returns:A list of collins.easy.Product instance.
search(sessionid, filter=None, result=None)¶

Creates a new collins.easy.Search instance.

Note

See collins.Collins.productsearch().

Parameters:sessionid – The user session id.
Returns:A collins.easy.Search instance.
suggest(searchword, categories=None, limit=None)¶

Suggest additional words to the provided searchword.

Parameters:
  • searchword (str) – A search string to suggest items for.
  • categories (list) – A list of collins.easy.Category.
  • limit (int) – The maximum amount of results.
Returns:

A list of strings.
